system.effect: Connection - Tri Attack. You may use Tri Attack as if it had a range of “Melee, 3 Targets”. Make a different attack roll for each target. If Tri-Attack’s effect range is activated, do not roll for the effect; the first target can only be Frozen, the second can only be Burned, and the third can only be Paralyzed. Additionally, you may use Tri-Attack as a Physical Attack if you wish.
